sentences.sContent: The shouting rose to a deafening crescendo .
sentences.sCn: 喊叫声越来越响，到了震耳欲聋的强度。

sentences.sContent: The curtains opened as the music reached a crescendo .
sentences.sCn: 当音乐到达高潮时，大幕拉开了。

remMethod.val: crescend(成长； 上升) + o → (音乐)渐强

words.tran: 新月；新月状物；伊斯兰教的标记；土耳其的新月形国徽
以新月形物装饰；使成新月形

trans.tranOther: if a sound or a piece of music rises to a cre-scendo, it gradually becomes louder until it is very loud
